hero.mainTitle: WanderWise AI: Your Personalized Travel Planner
hero.tagline: Unleash Your Journey: AI-Crafted Itineraries, Real-time Insights, Effortless Adventures.
hero.headline: Your Dream Trip, Designed by AI, Perfected by You.
hero.subheadline: Stop endless planning. Start exploring. WanderWise AI crafts custom itineraries, finds real-time deals, and guides your visa journey, all in one place.

features.title: Personalized Itineraries, Instantly
features.description: Tell us your desires, and our AI will build a day-by-day adventure tailored just for you. From hidden gems to iconic landmarks, every detail is considered.

features.title: Real-time Insights, Always Current
features.description: Get the latest prices for flights and hotels, real-time availability for attractions, and up-to-the-minute local information. No more outdated guides or surprise costs.

features.title: Visa Made Simple
features.description: Navigate complex visa requirements with ease. We provide clear overviews and direct links to official sources, helping you prepare for your international journey.

features.title: Budget-Friendly Adventures
features.description: Set your budget, and let WanderWise AI find the best options to match. Discover incredible experiences without breaking the bank.

features.title: Effortless Planning, More Exploring
features.description: Spend less time researching and more time dreaming. Our intuitive platform makes planning your next escape a breeze.
